member.name: M:Sentry.data.Goldeneye.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The entry point into the Windows Service. You can also run this program as a console app if you pass "-console" as the first parameter.
member.remarks: Setup the Debug command line arguments in your Project properties to include "-console" so that you can debug your service.

member.name: P:Sentry.data.Goldeneye.Watch.WatchedDir
member.summary: Directory that is to be watched

member.name: M:Sentry.data.Goldeneye.Watch.OnStart(System.Int32,System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This method is called when the Windows Process is started in Core and Program.cs First it creates a file watcher, gives it a directory from app.config, then assigns it events to watch. The last thing it does is grabs all the files that currently in the directory and adds them to the file list. The Service will do the rest on it's periodic run.

member.name: M:Sentry.data.Goldeneye.Watch.GetCountStart
member.summary: Returns start datetime of file counter
